revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Total of items declared by ... And placed in suspense, out of 2068 drachmas 3 obols, after deducting the sums which were withdrawn from the category of suspended payments because they were collected before they were suspended, at Dionysias 20 dr., at Herakleia .. dr., at Arsinoe 20 dr., at Apias .. dr., at Athena 28 dr., making 206 dr., remainder in suspense 1862 dr. 3 ob. Remainder for ï¿½ 1 talent of silver 1763 dr. 5 ob. 2 chalkoi; for value of wine 574 dr. Total 1 talent 2337 dr. 5 ob. 2 chal. of which the classification and list of individual items is as it was sent in. Revenues from properties in grain-land and building sites which were confiscated to pay the debts of the division ... (2nd hand, in left-hand margin) Account of expenses: to Aithiopas, 9 dr., to Aurelius 4 dr., for cutting grass 6 dr. 1 chalkous, for the price of papyrus 1 dr., for a purse 1 dr.
